column1: Uchi////A dish that fell short (very short) of expectations was the hot rock beef. Though it might make for a great Instagram pic or addition to your snapchat story
column3: you'll recieve 5 small pieces of "wagyu" that taste like average sirloin
column4: accompanied by a simple ponzu dipping sauce. It's by no means bad-tasting
column5: but I'd reccomend spending that money on a few sirloins at HEB
column6: or at least any other dish on the menu.
